caption.title: Top 10 Performing Empirical Models ranked by F1 score.
caption.p: *All models marked have the same F1 score and are listed in order of descending AUC score. The AUC is the average of the AUC from the testing data, while the PPV and Sensitivity are measured at the threshold that maximizes the F1 score. For all empirical models, the frequency of the focal cluster, f c, at either t 1 or t 2 was the best fitness measure. The competition term either captured the average or variance in the frequency of competing clusters or how the absolute number of competing changes changed from t 1 to t 2.
Click here for additional data file.
